vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a new Specific Use Permit for an alcoholic beverage establishment limited to a bar, lounge, or tavern on property zoned CR Community Retail District and a P(A) Parking District, on the west line of Inwood Road north of Lovers Lane
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a three-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a three-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Z234-333(CC)
